message:
I am trying to use Firebase and i get this error message in the log cat
and there is no answer for that in stackoverflow

java.lang.IllegalAccessError: tried to access method java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor.setRemoveOnCancelPolicy:()V from class com.firebase.client.utilities.DefaultRunLoop

any help ??
or there is any stable alternative to Parse
Thanks in Advace
